Subject: Problem with Creating Jobs based on Profile with Overrides.
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=167602118
X-Yahoo-Profile: ranjeetbhatia1976


Hi all, I have edited the simple profile by adding overrides for a
particular domain. In the override I just modified certain scope
parameters such as I reduced max-hop-links from the default value of 5
to 4. I save the profile - no problems.

But as soon as I try to create a new job based on this profile I get
the following error. I am using version 1.2.0 and interacting with
application only with the WUI. Any help will be greatly
appriciated....

Many thanks.

****************************************************
